name: The Mysterious Mine Bouncin' Back Edition
storyline: The year is 2006 and a young boy named Trae (the hero is the author of this hack) has been sent to do a late night errand for his mother. However, things are not right. Strange humans are located around town. When Trae encounters one of the higher strange fighters he is sent to the mysterious mine. What exactly will happen to our hero?
summary: This is the author’s Earthbound hack that they have worked on since 2006. This hack is a graphics, story, gameplay change hack.
